XML::XPath::Node::Text(3) User Contributed Perl Documentation XML::XPath::Node::Text(3)

NAME

Text - an XML text node

API

new ( text )

Create a new text node.

getValue / getData

Returns the text

string_value

Returns the text

appendText ( text )

Adds the given text string to this node.

2018-10-11 perl v5.30.2
